root: ^Now that this wax model is done, I can finally display it in the museum.
^In fact, you helped me so well, that I've decided to give you your diploma!
^This is the perfect moment to try out this new technology I've heard of...
^It's called "Electronic Mail"... do you know it?
^Would you give me your "Electronic Mail Address"?

NO: ^Ah... that's a shame. I'll have to try it another time.
CONV: ^Anyway [player_name], it's time I see to my other duties.
^Thank you so much for your help, have a great afternoon!
